thread.title: Ohio Valley Salon Aims to 'Make A Difference'
thread.title_full: Ohio Valley Salon Aims to 'Make A Difference' - WTRF 7 News Sports Weather - Wheeling Steubenville

author: cbs8
title: Ohio Valley Salon Aims to 'Make A Difference'
text:
MARTINS FERRY, Ohio - As part of Breast Cancer Awareness Month, Cloud 9 Salon in Martins Ferry is doing their part to give back to the community with their 'Make a Difference Monday'.
This is the 5th year the salon has decided to get involved and try to help a cancer patient here in the Ohio Valley , by donating their skills to raise money from all the proceeds they bring in on Monday, October 26th.
"So, we'll be doing hair and make up, and manis and pedis, and were donating all of the proceeds to Ryan Reithmiller, a cancer victim in Martins Ferry, Ohio. We have all kinds of little things going on -- we have a raffle going on," said salon owner, Bridgette McCloud.
The idea came about five years ago when Stylist Jamie Green suggested they get involved in helping Ohio Valley cancer patients.
To take part in the online raffle, you can visit the Cloud 9 Facebook page , or stop in the salon on Zane Highway in Martins Ferry.
